sections.description: Read the following passage and answer the questions

questions.subject: reading
questions.questionText: What is the main idea of the passage?
questions.passageText: The art of storytelling has been a fundamental part of human culture for thousands of years. From ancient cave paintings to modern novels, stories have served as a way to preserve history, teach lessons, and entertain audiences. Stories help us understand different perspectives and connect with others on an emotional level.

options.text: Storytelling is an important part of human culture with multiple purposes

questions.explanation: The passage emphasizes that storytelling has been part of human culture for thousands of years and serves multiple purposes including preserving history, teaching, and entertainment.
